LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.DC.1d..translation: Cozmo misses you and it's been a day since you've connected to him.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.DNC.1d.translation: Cozmo misses you and last time you didn't even connect to him.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.NextAM.01.translation: Good morning.  Don't forget to give Cozmo some attention today!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.NextPM.01.translation: Good afternoon.  Don't forget to give Cozmo some attention today!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.3d.01.translation: Cozmo wants you back!  It's been three days.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.01.translation: Cozmo wants you back!  He hasn't seen you in a week.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.14d.01.translation: Cozmo misses you!  It's been two weeks.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.30d.01.translation: Cozmo wants you back!  He hasn't seen you in a month.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.365d.0.translation: Cozmo misses you!  It's been a year.

LocalNotif.DailyPreReminder.DC.01.translation: Cozmo wants some daily attention, and yesterday you connected with him.

LocalNotif.DailyPreReminder.DNC.01.translation: Cozmo wants some daily attention, but yesterday you opened the app but didn't connect with him.

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Repair.Warning.01.translation: Cozmo is starting to need a tune-up!

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Repair.Critical.0.translation: Cozmo is in really bad shape.  He needs a tune-up!

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Energy.Warning.01.translation: Cozmo is starting to get hungry!

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Energy.Critical.0.translation: Cozmo is starving.  He needs to be fed!

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Play.Warning.01.translation: Cozmo needs some activity.  He's starting to get bored.

LocalNotif.NeedBracket.Play.Critical.01.translation: Cozmo is desperate for attention.  He's really bored!

LocalNotif.NeedLevel.Repair.Decaying.01.translation: Cozmo's health is decaying.  He could use a tune-up.

LocalNotif.NeedLevel.Energy.Decaying.01.translation: Cozmo's energy is running low.  He could use a bite to eat.

LocalNotif.NeedLevel.Play.Decaying.01.translation: Cozmo's boredom is starting to set in.  He could use some time and attention.

LocalNotif.Tokens.3.ToGo.01.translation: Achieve three daily tokens to unlock the next bonus box.

LocalNotif.Tokens.3.ToGo.02.translation: Only three more daily tokens to unlock the next bonus box.

LocalNotif.Tokens.2.ToGo.01.translation: Achieve two more daily tokens to unlock the next bonus box.

LocalNotif.Tokens.2.ToGo.02.translation: Only two more daily tokens to unlock the next bonus box.

LocalNotif.Tokens.1.ToGo.01.translation: Achieve one more daily tokens to unlock the next bonus box.

LocalNotif.Tokens.1.ToGo.02.translation: Only one more daily token to unlock the next bonus box.
